title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 02/16/2019
itunes:title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 02/16/2019
description:
Colin talks with The Ringer's Bryan Curtis about Bob Costas taking a shot at the NFL on his way out the door at NBC.  The NFL liking the AAF stealing viewers from other sports and the some media experimentation around baseball in this exclusive podcast. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
